testcase.name: Login functionality with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User open the browser.................................................passed And User enters the url "www.gmail.com".....................................passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed When User enters name "LGUser1".............................................passed And User enters password "Password@1".......................................passed And User clicks on Sign In button...........................................passed Then User should gt successfully logged in..................................passed And Browser should get closed...............................................passed
